empty.description: Clear filters or add a new project.
empty.title: No projects found
No projects found
empty.description: There are no projects available for this cluster.

warnings.gpuWarning: This quota has exceeded the available GPUs on the target cluster.
warnings.cpuWarning: This quota has exceeded the available CPUs on the target cluster.
warnings.memoryWarning: This quota has exceeded the available memory on the target cluster.

name.label: Name
name.description: Provide a unique name for the project. Only lowercase letters, numbers and hyphens are allowed.

validation.unique: A project with the same name already exists.
validation.format: A project name can only consist of lowercase characters, numbers and '-' character (and not start or end with '-').
validation.length: The name of the project must be between 2 and 41 characters.

validation.exceedProjectsCount: This cluster has reached the limit of {{num}} projects.

validation.required: Please enter a description for the project.
validation.length: The description must be between 2 and 1024 characters.

notification.error: Failed to create project. Please try again later.

delete.title: Danger Zone
delete.message: These changes are permanent and cannot be undone. Please make sure the project is not in use, prior to deletion.

confirmation.title: Confirm Deletion
confirmation.description: Are you sure you want to delete this project {{project}}? The action is permanent and cannot be undone.

notification.error: Failed to delete project. Please try again.

validation.required: Please enter a description for the project.
validation.length: The description must be between 2 and 1024 characters.

guaranteedQuota.info: Define a quota below to guarantee a fixed amount of compute resources for the assigned project. Setting a quota category to 0 means no resources are guaranteed exclusively for that project â€” its workloads will still use any available resource.  Even with a quota in place, workloads may temporarily exceed their quota if additional resources are available.

notification.error: Failed to update project. Please try again later.

modal.intro: Search and select user(s) you want to add to the {{project}} project.
modal.title: Add User(s) to Project

users.selected: Please select at least one user.

notification.success: User(s) added to the project successfully! Please note that it may take up to 5 minutes for the changes to take effect.
notification.error: Failed to add User(s) to the project! Please try again later.

remove.label: Remove from project
remove.description: Are you sure you want to remove {{firstName}} {{lastName}} from {{project}} project?

notification.success: User(s) deleted from the project. Please note that it may take up to 5 minutes for the changes to take effect.
notification.error: Failed to delete User(s) from the project! Please try again later.

project.label: Project
project.placeholder: Please select a project to assign to this user.

project.selected: Please select a project to be assigned to this user

invitedUsers.title: Invited users

remove.label: Remove from project
remove.description: Are you sure you want to remove {{email}} from {{project}} project?

notification.success: User(s) deleted from the project. Please note that it may take up to 5 minutes for the changes to take effect.
notification.error: Failed to delete User(s) from the project! Please try again later.

invitedUsers.disabled: Disabled when organization has an identity provider

waitTimeAvg.title: Wait Time (Avg)
waitTimeAvg.description: The average time a workload spends waiting to be executed, prior to execution.

quotaUtilizationAvg.title: Quota Utilization (Avg)
quotaUtilizationAvg.description: The average ratio of utilized GPUs versus the allocated GPUs for all workloads running within the project, submitted in the selected time range.

gpuIdleTimeAvg.title: GPU Idle Time (Avg)
gpuIdleTimeAvg.description: The average time each GPU devices allocated to the project is in an idling state. Idle state meaning running workloads not utilizing GPUs quota allocated to the project.

gpuDeviceUsage.title: GPU Device Usage
gpuDeviceUsage.description: The number of GPU devices utilized by workloads in this project versus the GPUs allocated to it, over specified timeframe.

vramDeviceUsage.title: GPU VRAM Usage
vramDeviceUsage.description: The amount of GPU VRAM GPU utilized by workloads in this project versus the VRAM allocated to them, via the allocated GPUs, over specified timeframe.
